name: @drashland/accio
description: An easy way to search for deeply nested data in large datasets
author: Drash Land

scripts.build: yarn build:esm-lib && yarn && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs
scripts.build:windows: bash console/build_esm_lib ./src ./mod.ts --workspace=./tmp/conversion_workspace --debug && yarn && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm
scripts.test: yarn test:deno && yarn test:cjs && yarn test:esm
scripts.validate:nix: rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock && yarn build && yarn test
